alert.note: Alert for Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 12:49PM EST until December 21 at 1:45PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at North Sidney. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 22.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:30 PM EST Wednesday was 32.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage around daybreak tomorrow. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.2 feet on 12/19/2003. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
